examples: This command lists all the assets in subscription `xxxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxx`
This command lists all the asset endpoint profiles in subscription `xxxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxx`
This command lists all the Device Registry billing containers from subscription `xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx`
Lists the Device Registry Namespaces in a resource group.
Lists all the Device Registry Namespace Assets within the parent Namespace.
Lists the Namespace Devices in the parent Namespace.
Lists all Namespace Discovered Assets in the specified parent Namespace.
Lists all Namespace Discovered Devices in a specified parent Namespace.
Lists all Schemas in a specified parent Schema Registry.
Lists all Schema Registries in a specified Resource Group.
Lists all Schema Versions in a specified parent Schema.
Creates a new asset `test-asset` in resource group `test-rg`

New-AzDeviceRegistryAssetEndpointProfile -Name test-assetendpointprofile -ResourceGroupName test-rg -ExtendedLocationName "/subscriptions/xxxxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxx/resourcegroups/test-rg/providers/microsoft.extendedlocation/customlocations/test-custom-location" -ExtendedLocationType CustomLocation -Location eastus2 -TargetAddress "opc.tcp://foo" -AuthenticationMethod Certificate -X509CredentialsCertificateSecretName myCertificateRef -EndpointProfileType OpcUa -DiscoveredAssetEndpointProfileRef myDiscoveredAssetEndpointProfileRef
Creates a new asset endpoint profile `test-assetendpointprofile`in resource group `test-rg`
Creates a new Namespace using expanded parameters.
Creates a new Namespace Asset with expanded parameters.
Creates a new Namespace Device with expanded parameters.
Creates a new Namespace Discovered Asset with expanded parameters.
Creates a new discovered device in the specified namespace with expanded parameters.

New-AzDeviceRegistrySchema -ResourceGroupName "my-resource-group" -RegistryName "my-registry" -Name "my-schema" -DisplayName "My Device Schema" -Description "Schema for device data" -Format "JsonSchema/draft-07" -Tag @{"sampleKey" = "sampleValue"}
Creates a new schema in the specified schema registry with expanded parameters.

New-AzDeviceRegistrySchemaRegistry -ResourceGroupName "my-resource-group" -SchemaRegistryName "my-schema-registry" -Location "East US" -Namespace "my-namespace" -DisplayName "My Schema Registry" -Description "Registry for device schemas" -StorageAccountContainerUrl "https://mystorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/schemas"
Creates a new schema registry with expanded parameters.

New-AzDeviceRegistrySchemaVersion -ResourceGroupName "my-resource-group" -SchemaRegistryName "my-schema-registry" -SchemaName "my-schema" -Name "1.0.0" -Description "Initial version of the device schema" -SchemaContent '{"type":"object","properties":{"deviceId":{"type":"string"},"temperature":{"type":"number"}}}'
Creates a new schema version under the specified schema resource (nested under the specified schema registry resource) with expanded parameters.

This command updates an asset's `Model` property with value `ContosoModel2`.
Note: the output response is only the operation status of the update command, not the patched asset.

This command updates an asset endpoint profile's `TargetAddress` property with value `opc.tcp://bar`.
Note: the output response is only the operation status of the update command, not the patched asset endpoint profile.
Updates a Device Registry Namespace by specifying the properties to update.
Updates a Device Registry Namespace Asset by modifying its properties using individual parameters.
Updates a Device Registry Namespace Device by modifying its properties using individual parameters.
Updates a Device Registry Namespace Discovered Asset by modifying its properties using individual parameters.
Updates a Device Registry Namespace Discovered Device by modifying its properties using individual parameters.
Updates a Device Registry Schema by modifying its properties using individual parameters.

Update-AzDeviceRegistrySchemaRegistry -ResourceGroupName "my-resource-group" -SchemaRegistryName "my-schema-registry" -DisplayName "My Updated Schema Registry" -Description "Updated schema registry description"
Updates a Device Registry Schema Registry by modifying its properties using individual parameters.
Updates a Device Registry Schema Version by modifying its properties using individual parameters.
